name: Instant Pot Indian Curry
ingredients: 2 lb – Chicken, boneless, cut into 1-2 inch pieces
1 tsp – Ground Kashmiri Red Chili Powder
instructions: Heat instant pot in saute mode and add oil to it.
Ad the whole spices and saute for 30 seconds until fragrant
Add chili, onions, ginger, and garlic to pot and saute for 4 minutes until golden; stir often
Add tomatoes and ground spices, saute for another 4 minutes; stir often
Add chicken and saute for 4 minutes
Add Water/Broth, de-glaze and scrape anything stuck to the pot
Set the instant pot to manual/pressure cook mode on high for 5 minutes
Once finished, quick release the pressure manually
Optional: add coconut or heavy cream to thicken the curry
